quest.name: Oil Be Back
journal:
î‚¾ Quest Sync
Hilmar is offering good coin for a seemingly simple task.
objectives: Fill the mining lamps with pungent lamp oil.

dialogue.name: HILMAR
dialogue.text: Are you busy? Didn't think so.

dialogue.name: HILMAR
dialogue.text: I'm offering coin to anyone willing to fill up the lamps. Interested?

dialogue.name: HILMAR
dialogue.text: There are four of them. Here's the oil. Come and see me when you're done.

dialogue.name: HILMAR
dialogue.text: I'd like it done now, if you don't mind.

dialogue.name: HILMAR
dialogue.text: Finally finished, then. Gnomes didn't get in your way, did they?

dialogue.name: HILMAR
dialogue.text: There seem to be more and more of them these days. Makes even filling the lamps a pain in the arse.

dialogue.name: HILMAR
dialogue.text: Still, can't let them stop us from doing our jobs. Just another occupational hazard.

dialogue.name: HILMAR
dialogue.text: Anyway, here's your pay. Good work, sinner.
